summary.summary: Full-Stack Developer with 2 years of experience specializing in Vue.js and Node.js. Focused on building scalable and efficient web applications. Seeking remote opportunities to contribute to innovative solutions.

taw.api: Created REST API with Node.js and PostgreSQL
